Description: Small pendant made of faience in the shape of a small flower. The base is flat, the upper part is textured. At the top a small disc-shaped bead would have been attached as a lug but is now broken off. The pendant shows no traces of glaze. Parts of the base broken off.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14.7, second level
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
